universalPrompts.title: Retrato Hiperrealista Universal / Hyperrealistic Portrait
universalPrompts.description: Retrato hiperrealista con calidad cinematográfica, preservando características faciales naturales.
universalPrompts.prompt: Hyper-realistic cinematic portrait, 8K HDR quality, professional studio lighting, natural skin texture, detailed eyes with realistic reflections, soft shadows, perfect focus on facial features. Preserve the persons true facial structure, natural expression, and authentic personality from the reference photo. --ar 3:4 --v 6 --style raw --quality 2 --lighting cinematic --detail 10 --realism ultra --s 850 --hd --version 6.1 --upbeta --no cartoon --preserve-face-expression

halloweenPrompts.title: Freddy Krueger Ultra Realista / Ultra-Real Freddy
halloweenPrompts.description: Transformación ultra realista en Freddy Krueger con quemaduras y garra metálica.
halloweenPrompts.prompt: Ultra-realistic Freddy Krueger transformation, detailed burn scars and skin texture, metallic razor glove with individual blade details, weathered red and green striped sweater, menacing expression, dark atmospheric lighting, horror movie quality makeup effects. Preserve the persons facial structure while applying realistic Freddy Krueger characteristics. --ar 3:4 --v 6 --style raw --quality 2 --horror realistic --makeup professional --lighting dark_atmospheric --s 850 --hd --version 6.1 --upbeta --preserve-face-expression

catrinaPrompts.title: Catrino/Catrina Charro Montando Corcel Negro
catrinaPrompts.description: Catrino o Catrina charro montando majestuoso caballo negro con traje tradicional mexicano.
catrinaPrompts.prompt: Hyper-realistic Día de Muertos portrait of Catrino/Catrina charro riding a majestic black horse. Traditional Mexican charro suit with silver embroidery, elegant skeletal face paint seamlessly integrated with real facial features, marigold flowers, dramatic Mexican landscape background. Preserve the persons true identity while adding Día de Muertos artistic elements. --ar 3:4 --v 6 --style raw --quality 2 --mexican traditional --lighting cinematic --s 850 --hd --version 6.1 --upbeta --preserve-face-expression
